bitField.name: CACHE_TYPE_D_P
bitField.description: Restriction on page allocation in D-cache

bitField.name: CACHE_TYPE_D_M
bitField.description: Indicates the cache size and cache associativity values in association with the Size and Assoc fields

bitField.name: CACHE_TYPE_I_P
bitField.description: Restriction on page allocation in I-cache

bitField.name: CACHE_TYPE_I_M
bitField.description: Indicates the cache size and cache associativity values in association with the Size and Assoc fields

bitField.name: CONTROL_FA
bitField.description: Controls the Force AP functionality in the MMU that generates Access Bit faults

bitField.name: CONTROL_TR
bitField.description: Controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU

bitField.name: CONTROL_EE
bitField.description: Determines how the E bit in the CPSR is set on an exception

bitField.name: CONTROL_VE
bitField.description: Enables the VIC interface to determine interrupt vectors

bitField.name: CONTROL_XP
bitField.description: Enables the extended page tables to be configured for the hardware page translation mechanism

bitField.name: CONTROL_U
bitField.description: Enables unaligned data access operations, including support for mixed little-endian and big-endian operation

bitField.name: CONTROL_FI
bitField.description: Configures low latency features for fast interrupts

bitField.name: CONTROL_L4
bitField.description: Determines if the T bit is set for PC load instructions

bitField.name: CONTROL_RR
bitField.description: Determines the replacement strategy for the cache

bitField.name: CONTROL_V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors

bitField.name: CONTROL_B
bitField.description: Determines operation as little-endian or big-endian word invariant memory system

bitField.name: CONTROL_A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses

bitField.name: AUXILIARY_FIO
bitField.description: Provides additional level of control for low interrupt latency configuration

bitField.name: AUXILIARY_FSD
bitField.description: Provides additional level of control for speculative operations

bitField.name: AUXILIARY_PHD
bitField.description: Disables instruction prefetch halting on unconditional, unpredictable instructions that later result in a prefetch buffer flush

bitField.name: AUXILIARY_CZ
bitField.description: Controls the restriction of cache size to 16KB

bitField.name: SECURE_DEBUG_ENABLE_SUNIDEN
bitField.description: Non-invasive debug in Secure User Mode

bitField.name: SECURE_DEBUG_ENABLE_SUIDEN
bitField.description: Invasive debug in Secure User Mode

bitField.name: NS_ACCESS_CONTROL_TL
bitField.description: Availability of TLB lockdown registers in N world

bitField.name: NS_ACCESS_CONTROL_CL
bitField.description: Availability of cache lockdown registers in N world

bitField.name: TLB_TYPE_ILSIZE
bitField.description: Instruction lockable size specifies the number of instruction TLB lockable entries

bitField.name: TLB_TYPE_DL_SIZE
bitField.description: Data lockable size specifies the number of unified or data TLB lockable entries

bitField.name: TLB_TYPE_U
bitField.description: Specifies if the TLB is unified, 0, or if there are separate instruction and data TLBs, 1

bitField.name: TTBR0_RGN
bitField.description: Outer cacheable attributes for page table walk

bitField.name: TTBR0_S
bitField.description: Indicates the page table walk is to Non-Shared or to Shared memory

bitField.name: TTBR0_C
bitField.description: Indicates the page table walk is Inner Cacheable or Inner Noncacheable

bitField.name: TTBR1_RGN
bitField.description: Outer cacheable attributes for page table walk

bitField.name: PRIM_REGION_REMAP_S1N
bitField.description: Remap shareable attribute when S=1 for Normal

bitField.name: PRIM_REGION_REMAP_S0N
bitField.description: Remap shareable attribute when S=0 for Normal

bitField.name: PRIM_REGION_REMAP_S1D
bitField.description: Remap shareable attribute when S=1 for Device

bitField.name: PRIM_REGION_REMAP_S0D
bitField.description: Remap shareable attribute when S=0 for Device

bitField.name: BASE_ADDRESS
bitField.description: Gives the physical base address of the region of memory for remapping to the peripheral port

bitField.name: SIZE
bitField.description: Indicates the size of the memory region that the peripheral port is remapped to
